title: Seattle City Council Public Assets and Native Communities Committee 8/3/21
description:
View the City of Seattle's commenting policy: seattle.gov/online-comment-policy

In-person attendance is currently prohibited per Washington State Governor's Proclamation 20-28.15., until the COVID-19 State of Emergency is terminated or Proclamation 20-28 is rescinded by the Governor or State legislature. Meeting participation is limited to access by telephone conference line and online by the Seattle Channel.
Agenda: Call to Order, Approval of the Agenda, Chair's Report; Public Comment; Climate Pledge Arena Construction Update; CB 120139: granting Seattle Arena Company, LLC a permit for a tunnel; CB 120141: relating to Seattle Parks and Recreation - 1024 South Elmgrove Street; CB 120140: relating to Seattle Parks and Recreation - 3638 34th Avenue South.
